title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 516 - Rules For Courts-martial
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 516 - Rules For Courts-martial

State Regulations
§ 516.1 - General provisions
§ 516.2 - Jurisdiction
§ 516.3 - Initiation of charges; apprehension; pretrial restraint; related matters
§ 516.4 - Forwarding and disposition of charges
§ 516.5 - Court-martial composition and personnel; convening courts-martial
§ 516.6 - Referral, service, amendment and withdrawal of charges
§ 516.7 - Pretrial matters
§ 516.8 - Trial procedure generally
§ 516.9 - Trial procedure through findings
§ 516.10 - Sentencing
§ 516.11 - Post-trial procedure
§ 516.12 - Appeals and review
§ 516.13 - Summary courts-martial
§ 516.14 to 516.15 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 516

Statutory authority: Military Law, §130.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
